features.body: Use the newest technology to transform raw data into explanatory variables.
Connect to existing databases and upload spreadsheets or text files
Select a prediction problem with a click and FeauteLab does the rest
Use all of your data to achieve best results
Tune variables to create the best model for your business needs
Automatically create models that are as accurate as human-created models
Simulate new inputs and determine how different actions will affect future outcomes
Upload unlabeled data and download predictions.
Run FeatureLab in a secure cloud
Use FeatureLab with your existing architecture
Enjoyable software that you will want to use
